ca.zmatrix.cli
Class ParseCmd

java.lang.Object
  ca.zmatrix.cli.ParseCmd

public class ParseCmd
extends java.lang.Object

Offers an API to parse commands to a console application

isMonadic

public boolean isMonadic(java.lang.String parmName)
Tests if parmName is Monadic

Monadic term is used in predicate calculus to designate a form of logic based on unary operators

Parameters:
parmName - defined parmName as entered in parms Map by Builder
Returns:
boolean value indicating Monadic switch setting

size

public int size()
Returns integer indicating number of entries in parms Map

Returns:
int reflecting size of the underlying parms Map

validate

public java.lang.String validate(java.lang.String[] args)
Validates args[] against regular expressions defined for each entry in parms Map

Parameters:
args - from an input stream
Returns:
String is empty if regex's passes tests; alternatively it includes one or more messages corresponding to failed regular-expression tests for each parameter

isValid

public boolean isValid(java.lang.String[] args)
Convenience method in place of checking for length()==0 in response to validate(args). Usage is as follows: 
 Map R = new HashMap();
 String parseError    = cmd.validate(args);
 if( cmd.isValid(args) ) {
     R = cmd.parse(args);
     System.out.println(cmd.displayMap(R));
  } else { System.out.println(parseError); System.exit(1); }
 // R now containes merged values, e.g. defaults + input parms, as in:
 long loop = R.get("-loop");

Parameters:
args - Parameters from an input stream
Returns:
boolean indicating length()==0 calling validate(args)

parse

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parse(java.lang.String[] args)
Merges the supplied arguments with the default values resulting in the returned Map

Parameters:
args - Parms generally obtained from an input stream
Returns:
Map containing merged default and supplied values

displayParms

public java.lang.String displayParms()
Convenience method to generate a String representing the values, parms, produced by Buider and stored in Parms

Returns:
String sutable for printing by caller

displayMap

public java.lang.String displayMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> M)
Convenience method for the caller to print the Map produced by parse()

Parameters:
M - A Map collections variable typically the output of parse(args)
Returns:
String representation of Map suitable for printing

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
For Convenience, public static main method is included to show usage of the class to parse commands from an input stream; to invoke it, enter: 
 java  -jar parsecmd.jar

Parameters:
args - String array representing input arguments from command-line
